posts.post_content: Does anyone have a Merkle Sovereign or Old Mill back that they would sell. Looking for graded or raw in the Psa 2 or Sgc 20 range. Thanks.

[quote name="Joem36" post=1422975]Does anyone have a Merkle Sovereign or Old Mill back that they would sell. Looking for graded or raw in the Psa 2 or Sgc 20 range. Thanks.[/QUOTE]

Merkle throwing or portrait?

I'm only asking because I've been looking for a portrait Sovereign 150 for the last three years with no luck.  :(

Sean,
Doesn't  matter. I will not take the one you need. Good luck in your quest.
